project_descr: The project aims at supporting the Government of the United Republic of Tanzania in the implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan, which will contribute to a consistent and transparent system of monitoring human rights in Tanzania.

outputs.output_descr: Support to the implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan (NHRAP) aims to assist the Government of the United Republic of Tanzania in the implementation of the action plan, through the establishment of a transparent and robust monitoring human rights system. The main area of support will focus on building capacity of key government agencies, and harness relationships with Civil Society Organizations and other stakeholders for a comprehensive and effective monitoring architecture in Tanzania. UNDP is particularly committed to supporting the Commission for Human Rights and Good Gove
donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT

document_name: International Expert for Human Rights Terminal Project Evaluation
National Expert for Human Rights Action Plan Mid-term Evaluation
National Expert to support preliminary capacity needs assessment of the Commission on Human Rights
project_title: institutional support-national human rights action plan
